description:
In this course, you'll master the journey of taking a person you've never met to having them do business with you in under an hour.

By the end of the course

  • Have an answer to any objection at the tip of your tongue
  • Receive over 80 questions to ask throughout any influencing process
  • Close people with ease and grace without being pushy and make more money
  • Most of all, own the influencing process and master the game
title: Master Sales and Influence
